info.title: Cobalt Plugin
info.description: The `Cobalt` plugin provides web browsing functionality based on the Cobalt engine.

systemproperties.description: Configure some properties queried with Starboard System API

modelname.description: The production model number of the device

brandname.description: The name of the brand under which the device is being sold

modelyear.description: The year the device was launched

chipsetmodelnumber.description: The full model number of the main platform chipset

firmwareversion.description: The production firmware version number which the device is currently running

integratorname.description: The original manufacture of the device

friendlyname.description: A friendly name for this actual device

lmt.description: Limit advertising tracking, treated as boolean

url.description: The URL that is loaded upon starting the browser

autosuspenddelay.description: Applicable when pre-loading. Number of seconds to wait before suspending the app

closurepolicy.description: Configures how to handle window close request. Accepted values: [suspend, quit]. Default: 'quit'.

fireboltendpoint.description: A URL that specifies access point to Firebolt Riple. Should include session id in the query.

sbmainargs.description: A list of additional arguments to pass to StarboardMain.
